artist: Engraver: Giuseppe Asioli; Painter: After Bartolommeo Ramenghi; Delineator: Francisco Rosapina
inscription:
Signature, Title and Inscriptions

on sheet below image in black:[B. Ramenghi detto Bagnacavallo  dip.   F. Rosaspina dis.  G. Asioli inc./ LA S. FAMIGLIA, E LI SS. PAOLO  BENEDTEEO, E MARIA MADDALENA]; on sheet in pencil bottom left in pencil: [See Bagnacavallo]; on verso in pencil upper right corner: [90]
title: La S. Famiglia e Li SS. Paolo, Benedetto e Maria Maddalena
